Message:
I am special.
Thus, I possess servants
called shadows.
Not all lives bear the same value.

I stand without equal,
and my shadows are but dispensable.

Then one day,
a new shadow was
brought before me...

“I, Asahi, shall
protect you, my princess.
Even if it means my death!”

This lowly shadow dared
address me with a smile.

Acting as if I were but
some ordinary person.

“’Tis disrespectful,”
I soon reprimanded her.
Yet, that smile of hers
did not fade away.

A most peculiar servant indeed.
She was the first to introduce
herself to me by name.

To give her name to me
without a trace of fear...
